body_html: @yongtang Looks like bash did found patch, so no need to add patch to PATH. The "Timed out" error seems strange to me. Can you try to run patch -p1 -d C:/users/user/_bazel_user/4opxzgxi/external/png_archive -i C:/users/user/tensorflow/third_party/png_fix_rpi.patch under MSYS, see what happens?
body_text: @yongtang Looks like bash did found patch, so no need to add patch to PATH. The "Timed out" error seems strange to me. Can you try to run patch -p1 -d C:/users/user/_bazel_user/4opxzgxi/external/png_archive -i C:/users/user/tensorflow/third_party/png_fix_rpi.patch under MSYS, see what happens?
body: @yongtang Looks like bash did found `patch`, so no need to add `patch` to `PATH`. The "Timed out" error seems strange to me. Can you try to run `patch -p1 -d C:/users/user/_bazel_user/4opxzgxi/external/png_archive -i C:/users/user/tensorflow/third_party/png_fix_rpi.patch` under MSYS, see what happens?
